title: "Preparatory reading"
date: today

::: {.callout-tip}
### Learning Objectives

By the end of this session, participants will be able to:

- Locate relevant study registries  
- Discuss the benefits of publish in registered report format 
- Describe the importance of having a Data Management Plan (DMP) and working with data
according to the FAIR principles    
      
:::
